ministry: Government of Karnataka & Karnataka Milk Federation (KMF)
description: Joint initiative by Karnataka Government and KMF launched in April 2014 to provide economic empowerment to rural women engaged in dairy farming through training, financial support, and resources.
target_beneficiaries: Rural women engaged in dairy farming
Women from backward castes, Scheduled Tribes, minority communities
Members of women dairy cooperative societies

other_conditions: Must be member of a women dairy cooperative society under KMF
10,000 women selected per district under Phase III
40 women selected from each of 250 women dairy cooperative societies

required_documents: Membership proof of dairy cooperative society
benefits: Training in livestock management, animal feed, and dairy farming

steps: Identification of eligible women by KMF societies
